lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert. January 31, 2014 at the age of 74. Our friend and esteemed colleague Bob will be greatly missed by all of us who had the honor of knowing him. Bob was extremely successful in life and as smart as they come, hardworking and charismatic. Our loving sympathy goes out to his wife Betsy, his children Ned and Nancy and their spouses Lyndsay and Stephen. Bob also leaves behind four beautiful grandchildren, Casey, Charlie, Michael and Matthew who were the light of his life. All of the members of our families are devastated by this loss. With profound sadness, The Blumencranz and Wilkins Families
